products.name: Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
products.description: Even bad code can function. But if code isn't clean, it can bring a development organization to its knees. This book teaches you how to write clean code through practical examples.
features: Written by Robert C. Martin (Uncle Bob)
Includes case studies of increasing complexity
Teaches heuristics and smells to avoid

products.name: Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software
products.description: The Gang of Four's classic catalog of 23 patterns to solve common design problems. Essential reading for object-oriented designers.
features: Covers creational, structural, and behavioral patterns
Written by Gamma, Helm, Johnson, and Vlissides

products.name: The Pragmatic Programmer: Your Journey To Mastery
products.description: This book teaches you how to become a pragmatic programmer who produces flexible, easy-to-maintain software with pride and accountability.
features: Covers career development and technical skills
Includes practical tips and best practices
Focuses on the essence of software development

products.name: Eloquent JavaScript: A Modern Introduction to Programming
products.description: This much anticipated and thoroughly revised third edition teaches you JavaScript from the ground up. Covers up to ES2020 features.
features: Great for beginners and experienced programmers

products.name: Python Crash Course, 2nd Edition
products.description: A hands-on, project-based introduction to programming using Python. Perfect for beginners who want to build practical applications.
features: Includes projects on games, data visualization, and web apps

features: First book in the popular YDKJS series
